thread.section_title: NZ Rockshop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NZ Rockshop | rockshop.co.nz
thread.title: Neville Berry
thread.title_full: NZ Rockshop reviewed by Neville Berry

author: Neville Berry
title: Neville Berry
text: Enquired about a particulat amp but it was not in stock at the local Hutt Valley Rockshop so they liaised with Wellington who had one to make sure I got what I wanted ASAP. I have made a number of purchases now and they always do their best to help out and source what I am after. I recommend them to others.
